meanings.definition: A person or company that converts animal fat into tallow or lard.
meanings.sent1: The renderers collected animal fat to make tallow for candles.
meanings.sent2: The local renderers are known for their high-quality lard products.
meanings.sent3: The renderers had a fat-tastic day turning animal fat into useful products.
meanings.sent4: The renderers worked their magic, transforming fat into valuable tallow.
meanings.sent5: The renderers' skill in converting animal fat into tallow is impressive.

meanings.definition: A computer program or software that processes images or graphics.
meanings.sent1: I use a powerful renderers program to create stunning graphics.
meanings.sent2: The renderers on my computer help me edit and enhance images.
meanings.sent3: The renderers software turned my doodles into beautiful artwork.
meanings.sent4: The renderers transformed the plain image into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: With the renderers, I can bring my creative ideas to life on screen.

meanings.definition: A substance used to coat walls or surfaces to make them smooth.
meanings.sent1: The builders applied the renderers to the walls for a polished finish.
meanings.sent2: The renderers used in construction projects ensure a sleek surface.
meanings.sent3: The walls felt like silk after the application of the renderers.
meanings.sent4: The renderers acted like a magic wand, smoothing out imperfections.
meanings.sent5: The renderers transformed the rough walls into a smooth canvas.
